languages.text: "Я бы согласился, что на флагмане лучше, но ведь там в тенях рыщут больные убийцы".
languages.translation_comment:
Resolved the crisis on Janus.
Kibellah: "Janus is full of colour and fragrance, but I will not miss it. The decks of the flagship mean more to me than this rampant greenery."

languages.text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."
languages.translation_comment:
Resolved the crisis on Janus.
Kibellah: "Janus is full of colour and fragrance, but I will not miss it. The decks of the flagship mean more to me than this rampant greenery."
languages.original_text: "Я бы согласился, что на флагмане лучше, но ведь там в тенях рыщут больные убийцы".

traits.locale_text: "I would agree that aboard the flagship is better — if it didn't have deranged assassins skulking in the shadows."
"I would agree that aboard the flagship is better — if it didn't have deranged assassins skulking in the shadows."
"I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

"I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

languages.text: 「旗艦に乗っている方が良いという意見には同意する。隅に狂ったアサシンが潜んでいなければの話だが」
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: 「旗艦に乗っている方が良いという意見には同意する。隅に狂ったアサシンが潜んでいなければの話だが」

languages.text: "Ich stimme zu, dass es an Bord des Flaggschiffs besser ist – wären da nur nicht diese irren Assassinen in den Ecken."
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stimme zu, dass es an Bord des Flaggschiffs besser ist – wären da nur nicht diese irren Assassinen in den Ecken."

languages.text: «Estaría de acuerdo en que es preferible estar a bordo de la nave insignia... si no hubiera asesinos desquiciados acechando en los rincones».
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: «Estaría de acuerdo en que es preferible estar a bordo de la nave insignia... si no hubiera asesinos desquiciados acechando en los rincones».

languages.text: “我也同意呆在旗舰上更好，要是没有精神错乱的刺客潜伏在角落里，那就更好了。”
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: “我也同意呆在旗舰上更好，要是没有精神错乱的刺客潜伏在角落里，那就更好了。”

languages.text: "Her bir köşesinde aklını yitirmiş suikastçılar dolaşıyor olmasaydı sancak gemisinde bulunmak daha iyi diyebilirdim."
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: "Her bir köşesinde aklını yitirmiş suikastçılar dolaşıyor olmasaydı sancak gemisinde bulunmak daha iyi diyebilirdim."

languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

languages.text: « Je conviens que se trouver à bord du vaisseau amiral est préférable... même si je déplore la présence dans chaque recoin d'assassins ayant perdu la tête. »
languages.original_text: "I would agree that being aboard the flagship is better — if only there weren't deranged assassins skulking in its corners."

traits.locale_text: « Je conviens que se trouver à bord du vaisseau amiral est préférable... même si je déplore la présence dans chaque recoin d'assassins ayant perdu la tête. »
